QuestData.Title: Attempted Murder
QuestData.Description: Your bartender Lunzul is dying, commander. She's been poisoned and needs an antidote immediately.$B$BOne of your scouts reported seeing a Shattered Hand orc nearby recently - that's our best bet.$B$BThere is a small arakkoa camp to the east that sits near a known Shattered Hand encampment. I suggest we start our search there.$B$BI've already spoken to your flight master about securing us a flight; every second counts.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Hutou Featherwind to secure a flight to Shadow's Vigil.
